movies.title: Tokyo Psycho
movies.originalTitle: Tôkyô densetsu: ugomeku machi no kyôki
movies.plot: Sachiko Kokubu, the beautiful owner of a Tokyo design agency, finds her life disrupted when she receives paper scraps stitched together with piano wire with the message "I know you were meant to marry me." As further messages come she embarks on a nightmare investigation to uncover the identity of her tormentor.
movies.simplePlot: Sachiko Kokubu, the beautiful owner of a Tokyo design agency, finds her life disrupted when she receives paper scraps stitched together with piano wire with the message "I know you were ...

biography.bio: Seiji Chihara was born on January 25, 1970 in Kyoto, Japan. He is an actor, known for Moon Child (2003), Hana (2006) and Hanging Garden (2005).
biography.name: Seiji Chihara

biography.bio: Yuka Hayashi is an actress, known for Tokyo Psycho (2004).
biography.name: Yuka Hayashi

biography.bio: Sachiko Kokubu is an actress, known for Fighter in the Wind (2004), Onmyoji: The Yin Yang Master (2001) and Saki the Killer (2011). She has been married to Ippei Hayashiya since March 22, 2011.
biography.name: Sachiko Kokubu

biography.bio: Mizuho Nakamura is an actress, known for Tokyo Psycho (2004).
biography.name: Mizuho Nakamura

biography.bio: Masashi Taniguchi was born on November 5, 1977 in Tokyo, Japan. He is an actor, known for Kamen Rider Amazons (2016), Boys Love (2006) and The Scissors Massacre (2008).
biography.name: Masashi Taniguchi
